title: 1976 kayak canoe Olympics. No. 13
brief_description: Part thirteen of a series which record the last three days of heats, repercharges and semi-finals of the 1976 Olympic Canoe and Kayak races in Montreal, 1976. Excellent for stroke analysis and coaching, as it includes slow motion close-ups of the best paddlers in the world. The 500m and 1000m finals are shown. Photographed by Dr. Stan Plagenhoef.
